attributes.action: Strip the Sultan of Brunei of his honorary degree awarded by Aberdeen University
attributes.additional_details: In order to uphold Aberdeen's mantra of inclusivity and equality, it is urgent that we act fast and stand together with the LGBTQ+ community of Brunei. Bolkiah must be stripped of his honorary degree to make it clear that the student community will not associate themselves with a man behind such barbaric policies.
attributes.background: An honorary degree awarded by the University of Aberdeen to Hassanal Bolkiah in 1995 is under review as his country makes gay sex an offence punishable by stoning to death.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the university, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you'd like the UK Government to act, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251142
